Address.label: Address
Address.value: 4500 DORR STREET, TOLEDO, Ohio, 43615, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Welltower OP LLC owns a diversified healthcare portfolio of over 1,800 in-place properties spread across the senior housing, medical office, and skilled nursing/post-acute care sectors. The portfolio includes over 100 properties in both Canada and the United Kingdom as the company looks for additional investment opportunities in countries with mature healthcare systems that operate similarly to that of the United States.

value.name: John F. Burkart
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
